body: Well, who likes Fifa? Im obsessed with soccer! Its da best! Especially Fifa, World Cup, in Brazil! As you know the balls are Le Bruzuca brand. Well these balls are hard to get for yourself. They are used specifcly for Fifa. Well, guess wat! Fifa lovers shield your eyes or be jelly. Now before your very eyes stands myvery own Fifa ball!!!!!!!! I managed to snag it ^-^ Wat ya think?

title: FIFA LOVERS!!! Come once, Come all! Jelly?
